EmailTemplate.description: Individual FPR Courtesy Reviewer Reviewed without Comments, others are still pending Email
EmailTemplate.name: Individual FPR Courtesy Reviewer w/o Comments
EmailTemplate.subject: Courtesy FPR {!PubReviewTeam__c.Publication__c} Has been Reviewed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Do not reply to this email message.
{!PubReviewTeam__c.Reviewer__c} has reviewed courtesy FPR {!PubReviewTeam__c.PubIDLink__c} . Please note, the FPR process has not completed and other reviews are still pending.
Contact the FPR coordinator, {!PubReviewTeam__c.AssignedFPRCFF__c}, If you have questions or need support.
{!PubReviewTeam__c.PubIDLink__c}
Thank you, FPR System
